history.narrative: Law 17-141, the “Park East Assistance Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-480 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 8, 2008, and February 5, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 22, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-293 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-141 became effective on April 15, 2008.
